title: Surface newly seeded prompts in the existing Prompt Library UI

requirements.summary: Ensure Prompt Library UI automatically reflects newly seeded backend prompts via the existing fetch flow and existing filters/details routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Prompt Library page shows an increased prompt count matching the backend getAllPrompts response for the current user.
The 30 new prompts can be found via existing search/category filters and open correctly in the prompt details view using existing routes.
No new UI controls are introduced specifically to expose these prompts (visibility is achieved via the existing listing APIs).

file_operations.description: Harden the existing useGetAllPrompts React Query configuration to reliably refetch updated prompt lists (e.g., after canister upgrade / reload) without introducing new UI controls or changing the overall fetch flow (useGetAllPrompts â†’ PromptLibraryPage).

Validate that PromptLibraryPage continues to derive its displayed prompt count and filtered results solely from the existing useGetAllPrompts data and existing filter logic, ensuring newly seeded prompts appear via search/category filters and render through the existing PromptCard navigation to prompt details.
